answers.label: When the date is past the "best by" date

When a week has past after opening it

questions.question: What way can you you put out a oil fire if it occurs when cooking?

answers.label: Turn off the burner and cover the fire with a metal lid
Keep cooking the oil fire will go out eventually
Turn off the burner and cover the fire with a glass lid
